rules: Rule1: If an outbreak was detected in City Alpha, then the crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.

Rule2: Provided that a field report was submitted by Team Theta, then if it is not the case that transmission being confirmed for Strain Delta implies that a mutation occurred in Strain Delta leading to the vaccine not being effective against Strain Delta, then travel was restricted for Region Zeta.
Rule3: Whenever a WHO alert was issued for Pandemic Iota, emergency funding was approved by Congress Kappa.
Rule4: Given that a WHO alert was issued for Pandemic Iota, the global response was activated for Protocol Psi.
Rule5: Either a media blackout was imposed in Region Lambda or, if emergency funding was approved by Congress Kappa, then the crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.
Rule6: Misinformation was spread on Social Nu or it is not the case that public panic was detected in City Mu.
Rule7: Should a false positive result occur for Test Xi, then a false negative result occurs for Test Xi.
Rule8: Assuming a false positive result occurred for Test Xi, it is not the case that a false negative result occurred for Test Xi.
Rule9: Provided that an outbreak was detected in City Beta, the crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.
Rule10: Whenever cluster analysis was done for Hotspot Sigma, contact tracing was completed for Network Rho.

Rule11: If the AI prediction was reliable from Algorithm Upsilon, then in the case that it is not the case that the negation of transmission being confirmed for Strain Delta implies that a mutation occurred in Strain Delta leading to the vaccine not being effective against Strain Delta implies travel was restricted for Region Zeta, the predictive model was accurate for Forecast Tau.
Rule12: Either expert consensus was reached by Panel Chi or traditional methods were not adequate for Survey Phi.
Rule13: Given that the global response was activated for Protocol Psi, international coordination occurred by Committee Omega.
Rule14: Diplomatic channels were used by Alliance Alpha2 or, if international coordination occurred by Committee Omega, then the crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.
Rule15: Either social distancing was mandated in Zone Beta2 or lockdown was implemented in Region Gamma2.
Rule16: Provided that lockdown was implemented in Region Gamma2, public panic was not detected in City Mu.
Rule17: Whenever government action was taken by Cabinet Zeta2, then if economic stimulus was approved for Package Delta2, financial aid was distributed from Fund Epsilon2.
Rule18: Government action was taken by Cabinet Zeta2 or a parliamentary vote passed for Bill Eta2.
Rule19: Assuming a parliamentary vote passed for Bill Eta2, then if economic stimulus was approved for Package Delta2, financial aid was distributed from Fund Epsilon2.
Rule20: The vaccine is effective against Strain Delta or the crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.
Rule21: Provided that travel was restricted for Region Zeta, quarantine was ordered for Region Epsilon.

Rule22: If lab analysis was completed for Sample Eta, then assuming it is not the case that transmission being confirmed for Strain Delta implies that a mutation occurred in Strain Delta leading to the vaccine not being effective against Strain Delta, travel was restricted for Region Zeta.
Rule23: Either lab analysis was completed for Sample Eta or a field report was submitted by Team Theta.
Rule24: In the event that it is not the case that an outbreak was detected in City Alpha or an outbreak was detected in City Beta, a false positive result occurred for Test Xi.
Rule25: Given that it is not the case that an outbreak was detected in City Alpha or an outbreak was detected in City Beta, a containment breach occurred in Region Gamma.

Rule26: Should it not be the case that if a superspreader was identified as Patient Pi, then assuming it is not the case that a mutation occurred in Strain Delta implies the vaccine is not effective against Strain Delta, herd immunity was not achieved in Population Omicron, then cluster analysis was done for Hotspot Sigma.
Rule27: Provided that it is not the case that social distancing being mandated in Zone Beta2 implies public panic was not detected in City Mu, economic stimulus was approved for Package Delta2.
Rule28: If it is not the case that a mutation occurred in Strain Delta implies the vaccine is not effective against Strain Delta, then herd immunity was achieved in Population Omicron.
Rule29: In the event that the AI prediction was not reliable from Algorithm Upsilon, traditional methods were adequate for Survey Phi.
Rule30: Provided that the crisis was not contained for Outbreak Theta2, public panic was detected in City Mu.
facts: Fact1: A WHO alert was issued for Pandemic Iota.
Fact2: A superspreader was identified as Patient Pi.
Fact3: A mutation occurred in Strain Delta.
Fact4: Transmission was confirmed for Strain Delta.
Fact5: It is not the case that a media blackout was imposed in Region Lambda.
Fact6: It is not the case that misinformation was spread on Social Nu.
Fact7: It is not the case that contact tracing was completed for Network Rho.
Fact8: It is not the case that the predictive model was accurate for Forecast Tau.
Fact9: It is not the case that expert consensus was reached by Panel Chi.
Fact10: It is not the case that diplomatic channels were used by Alliance Alpha2.
Fact11: It is not the case that a containment breach occurred in Region Gamma.
Fact12: It is not the case that financial aid was distributed from Fund Epsilon2.
Fact13: It is not the case that quarantine was ordered for Region Epsilon.

question: The crisis was contained for Outbreak Theta2.
